DataElement.preferredName: Unrelated Tissue Donor Search Negation Performed Reason
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An explanation of why a search was not performed for an unrelated tissue donor.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Not connected or associated e.g. by kinship._Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person._A detailed search of a donor registry designed to find an unrelated donor match. Potential donor samples are tested to verify the original typing and are then tested at a higher level of resolution and at all HLA loci required by the transplant center's protocol.:An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._Executed and carried through to completion.

Concepts.definition: Not connected or associated e.g. by kinship.
Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.

A detailed search of a donor registry designed to find an unrelated donor match. Potential donor samples are tested to verify the original typing and are then tested at a higher level of resolution and at all HLA loci required by the transplant center's protocol.

Property.preferredDefinition: Not; used for negation of a word or group of words.:Performed; carried out.

Executed and carried through to completion.
